modules.title: Introduction to DBMS
modules.description: Learn the fundamentals of DBMS, its history, features, and types of databases.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Database Models & ER Diagrams
modules.description: Understand different database models and learn to design ER diagrams for real-world applications.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Relational Model & Keys
modules.description: Learn about relations, attributes, primary keys, foreign keys, and referential integrity in databases.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Database Normalization & Schema Design
modules.description: Explore normalization techniques (1NF - 5NF) and how to design efficient database schemas.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Indexing & Hashing
modules.description: Understand indexing methods, B-trees, and hashing techniques to optimize database performance.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Transactions & Concurrency Control
modules.description: Learn about ACID properties, transaction states, and concurrency control mechanisms.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Deadlocks & Recovery in DBMS
modules.description: Understand deadlocks, detection techniques, and database recovery mechanisms.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Storage Management & File Organization
modules.description: Explore storage hierarchy, file organization techniques, and RAID storage.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Sharding & Replication Strategies
modules.description: Learn database partitioning, replication strategies, and distributed databases.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Database Security & Encryption
modules.description: Understand authentication, authorization, and encryption techniques in databases.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Backup & Disaster Recovery
modules.description: Learn strategies for database backup and disaster recovery planning.
modules.author: CSExplore Team

modules.title: Capstone Project: Designing a Scalable Database System
modules.description: Apply all DBMS concepts to design a scalable database system for a real-world use case.
modules.author: CSExplore Team
